name: amortizejs
description: Loan calculation and amortization schedule utility with support for multiple amortization methods.

scripts.build:web: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -e ./dist/node/calculator.js -o ./dist/web/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build && node ./dist/node/calculator.js

author: David Booth
